A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Every Star Wars fan should be insulted by this representation of the universe. Every value of the force has been squashed if you're a fan of the old movies watch them. Don't waste your money. As a Star Wars fan going in this movie was terrible. If you're not a Star Wars fan and just looking for a action flick this movie is still terrible. None of the fight scenes or well-choreographed the characters are all underdeveloped and the story is a absolute joke. The story reminds me of quests throwing it random characters for no reason at all.
